casebody.data:
Monday, January 8, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

00-132. Davidson v. Motorists Mut. Ins. Co.

Franklin App. No. 99AP-163. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for leave to file supplemental authority,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to file supplemental authority be, and hereby is, denied.
